Oh no! Why is ParentText not helpful?
referral_paths_data.options.1.text: This content is too basic for me

referral_paths_data.message.text:
It may seem like spending one-on-one time with your child won't help you with their behaviour right away, but patience is key. This time together helps you understand each other better and build a strong bond. When children feel heard and supported like this, it often helps improve their behaviour over time.

Would you like to try a new lesson now to learn more about one-on-one time?

feedback_data.question: We're here to listen. Please tell how to make ParentText more helpful by sharing your feedback in a single message.

referral_paths_messages.msg:
I am sorry to hear that ParentText is not working on your phone. Here are a few steps you can try: 

1. Ensure you have the latest version of WhatsApp installed on your phone. 
2. Check your internet connection to make sure it's stable. 
3. Send a message on WhatsApp to {WhatsApp SWIFT line support} to get additional help. Be sure to share your user ID. Your user ID is @fields.research_id

pre_post_goal_checkin_messages.msg: Would you like to get more help?
